mapper.select:
select id as id, x as x, y as y, areaLevel as areaLevel, scheduleId as scheduleId, orderNo as orderNo, userId as userId, status as status, sort as sort, createdTime as createdTime, updatedTime as updatedTime from dm_scheduler_seat
and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into dm_scheduler_seat( x, y, areaLevel, scheduleId, userId, orderNo, status, sort, createdTime, updatedTime) values( #{x}, #{y}, #{areaLevel}, #{scheduleId}, #{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})
mapper.update:
update dm_scheduler_seat
x=#{x},
y=#{y},
areaLevel=#{areaLevel},
scheduleId=#{scheduleId},
orderNo=#{orderNo},
userId=#{userId},
status=#{status},
sort=#{sort},
createdTime=#{createdTime},
updatedTime=#{updatedTime}
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( CASE WHEN dss.areaLevel = 0 THEN '_' WHEN dss.areaLevel = 1 THEN 'a' WHEN dss.areaLevel = 2 THEN 'b' WHEN dss.areaLevel = 3 THEN 'c' END separator '') as seatArray FROM dm_cinema_seat dcs, dm_scheduler_seat dss WHERE dcs.cinemaId = #{cinemaId} AND dss.scheduleId = #{scheduleId} AND dcs.x = dss.x AND dcs.y = dss.y GROUP BY dcs.x ORDER BY dcs.x ASC
